Text.Page:
(The soldier's corpse has been mutilated and still has a blade stuck in it.)

(But it's a {@LinkCreature:9#1000#Lokian} weapon, not a gula weapon.)

Weapons like this are evidence that the {@LinkCreature:9#1100#cultists} are working with the gulas. Collect more of these weapons to be sure.

For an amateur, you know your way around a blade. And you're right. This isn't a gula weapon.

Lok cultists working with the gulas? May the goddess Kaia preserve us!
